content.title: Podcasts
content.description: Podcast time is the best time. Tune in to The Meeting House Sunday morning teaching, catch a discussion from the leadership team, or learn from the experts.

content.text1: Podcast time is the best time. Tune in to our Sunday morning teaching, catch a discussion from our leadership team, or learn from the experts - we've got you covered.

list.title: The Meeting House Podcast
list.text: Join us each week for The Meeting House Podcast where we explore what it means to be a Christ-follower. Subscribe through iTunes or Spotify.
list.imageAlt: Team of pastors from The Meeting House sitting around a table and recording a podcast.

list.title: The After Party
list.text: Because the fun doesn't stop after Sunday morning. Dig deeper into theology, culture, and hot topics with experts in the field.
list.imageAlt: Young woman sitting at a table and looking at her notes from Sunday teaching at The Meeting House.

list.title: The Meeting House Roundtable
list.text: Join our leaders and staff team as we chat about church life, outreach, and who we are as The Meeting House.
list.imageAlt: Team of pastors from The Meeting House sitting around a table and recording a podcast.

list.title: The Meeting House Video Podcast
list.text: Subscribe to The Meeting House Video Podcast through iTunes or visit our YouTube channel for teaching videos and more fun stuff.
list.imageAlt: Production volunteer recording a Meeting House video.
